entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query/Perf: don't use Invoke in value comparer ObjectEqualsExpression lambdas #35206
    9.0.x
  • DbParameters with same name in FromSql/SqlQueryRaw get incorrectly deduplicated #35196
    10.0.0
  • EF Core 9 : the database operation was expected to affect 1 row(s), but actually affected 0 row(s) #35195

Closed

  • Object equality on object nested in JSON column #35147
  • Feature Request: Adding Support for Tuples in DbContext.Database.SqlQuery<T>() #35163
  • [Regression] Unexpected unbound variable error with closure #35152
    9.0.x
  • How to batch configure global filters on soft deleted entities and non-soft deleted entities #35145
  • Link https://aka.ms/efcore-docs-trimming is broken #34279
    10.0.0
  • [Regression] Exception on query comparing nullable int with ?? fallback on EF Core 9 #35095
    9.0.x
  • [Regression] "Table not found with alias" for column access inside subquery predicate #35118
    9.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35206 - Query/Perf: don't use Invoke in value comparer lambdas when constructing shaper with PopulateCollection #35207
  • [release/9.0] Correct VisitUnary operand evaluation in funcletizer (#35172) #35203
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0] Add missing Converts when simplifying in funcletizer (#35122) #35202
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0] Fix TPC equality check inside subquery predicate (#35120) #35201
    Servicing-consider
  • Simplify parameter names #35200
  • Add SqlServer translation for DateOnly.ToDateTime(timeOnly) #35194

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 9.1.0 to 9.1.1 #35205
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.66.0 to 2.67.0 #35204
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add missing Converts when simplifying in funcletizer #35122
  • Correct VisitUnary operand evaluation in funcletizer #35172
  • Fix TPC equality check inside subquery predicate #35120

Updated

  • Adding support for multiple and named query filters #35104
  • [release/9.0] Enable Cosmos vector search on EF9 #35183
    Servicing-consider, 9.0.x
  • Adding Half type support for SqlLite #35193
